exist.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to happen or be present in a particular situation or place
exist.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
The club will cease to exist if financial help is not found.
exist.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Tom acts as if I don’t exist at times.
exist.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to stay alive, especially in a difficult situation when you do not have enough money, food etc
exist.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The hostages existed on bread and water.
exist.translation[0].note_box[0].section: Do you think ghosts really exist?
